analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/31/0x51047b6c579c079b0e0992ee6198bd6df93bad1a.sol:
	Contract ElectronicEnergyCoin has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/31/0x51047b6c579c079b0e0992ee6198bd6df93bad1a.sol#219)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/31/0x51047b6c579c079b0e0992ee6198bd6df93bad1a.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
